subject: Shipping charge
description_text:
Hi,
I am trying to purchase some pedals on your website, the Plus X P3-H3 / Black / Baseplate, and the home page says free shipping over $399, however when I try to check out, it charges me $16 for shipping. A few hours ago it was free shipping but now it is trying to charge me for some reason, how do i fix this?
Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Tom Wiltshire,  â€‹It is found that you did not choose free logistics when placing the order, so there is no free shipping.

I think it was because my order was above $399 AUD, but it needed to be above $399 USD to get free shipping. I have ordered now and paid for shipping. Looking forward to using the pedals ? thanks!

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Tom Wiltshire,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.Wish you a pleasant day.
